entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI event declaration pattern is too verbose #48831
  • GenAPI doesn't always add a blank line between types #48830
  • .NET Template Engine: Post-Action Fails with Missing 'executable' Argument #48829
  • Virtual projects should use a `/path/to/file.cs.csproj` naming convention #48828

Closed

  • Can't scaffold Razor View by local Regional format #23170
  • `dotnet run` cannot run the project due to `System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')` exception #23148
  • New CopyLocal item metadata doesn't seem to work on ProjectReferences #23146
  • After install 6.0 GA arm64 SDK on Mac OS Monterey(12.0.1) Parallels VM on M1 machine, use ` dotnet --info ` met error "Unhandled exception." #22978
  • I can't create a project with dotnet cli #22846
  • building the branch "release/6.0.2xx" of the installer failed on amd64-linux-debian10 #22844
  • WinForms app which targeting .NET Core 3.1 is build failed on only have .NET 5.0.404-serving.21572.11 installed machine #22842
  • Templating workflows broken for paths with special characters on MacOS since SDK 9.0.200 #48794
  • Commit hashes inside the productCommit.txt doesn't match any repository #48801

PullRequests

Created

  • Add default for dotnet reference list Fixes #48555 #48825
  • Update README to point SDK installer link to dotnet/dotnet repository #48821

Merged

  • Add RoslynCompilerType Vbc tests #48798
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixup sln #48812
  • Replace P3 with P4 and remove Windows ARM & RHEL 6 rows #48824
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48822
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Fix the path check to ensure it correctly handles casing and character codes #45883
    untriaged
  • Fix Microsoft.IO.Redist versions #48819
    Area-CodeFlow
  • sln-add: --include-references when adding a project #48815
    Area-CLI
  • update template descriptions to be more beginner-friendly #48609
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Enable 'partial' AOT of the CLI #48790
    Area-CLI
  • Add trailing slash for -o Fixes #45682 #48640
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Ignore .slnx #48729
    Servicing-approved, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.6
  • Ensure file-based program artifacts are restricted to the current user #48813
    Area-run-file
  • Enable container test execution #48763
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support multiple files in file-based programs #48782
    Area-run-file
  • Add file-based program API for use by IDE #48749
    Area-run-file
